content.detailedDescription:
While looking up in the sky on the night of june 16th 2012 at aproximatly 10:30pm i saw a star that began to glow in a very bright orange color and grew in diameter for a few seconds, then it returned to its original glow and size (starlike) and started racing across the sky towards the west very fast, to fast to be a high altitude plane or even a satelite.
a few seconds later another starlike light was observed speeding in the same trajectory and moving at the same speed or even faster,all this occured in a 20 second timeframe.
content.summary: Starlike light started to glow in a bright orange and came back to original brightness and left westward  very fast

content.detailedDescription:
two friends and i were sitting outside of the store i manage. (after hours), just like we always do rain or clear, warm or cold. one friend sat in his car with the door open, legs outside, feet on the pavement. the second friend sat in a plastic lawn chair that we have in front of the store, which he pulled over to sit next to where the first friend was sitting with his car door open. i stooped next to them, since i had grown tired of standing, and didn't feel like sitting on the pavement.
 time: approx. 11:30-11:45. every night we see the occasional plane fly overhead heading into mbs, our local airport. once in awhile we'll spot the dot of a sat. going by. there are the few times when a helocopter will fly by also.  you know, the usual. there was cloud cover, but it was beginning to break up. temp was warm, with a pleasant breeze.
 the light caught my eye, and at first i thought it was just another plane, but the color of the light was odd. i said out loud to my friends, "well that dosen't look right," then stood up to view it better. the parking lot is lit, but not very well. the light had an almost mars colored glow, maybe a bit more red. there were no other light being emitted from it, steady, blinking, or otherwise.
 it approached from the south, and moved steadily, and at the speed of an airliner, maybe a little faster. my friend in the chair got up, and suggested that it might be a copter, but changed his mind because of the objects speed, and lack of noise. in fact there was no engine sounds throughout the entire incident.
 i moved out into the parking lot and turned my back to the lighting of the lot, while keeping my eyes on the thing the entire time. there was only one light coming from the side of a building, so i used my ball cap to block it, which clarified my vision.  once it was nerly overhead, i tried to see if i could see any wings, or other light sources coming from the object, but to my suprise, i saw a clear view of a round, almost egg shaped object flying by. it was directly overhead, and its edges were clearly defined, and i remember saying "wait...What the **** is that!" i knew that i had never seen anything like it before.  

 experimental aircraft? non earth aircraft? don't know. i have never sighted or reported a sighting before. this is a first for me, and a  strange enough incident for me to report it.
 don't be afraid to contact me, and thank you for your time.
content.summary: The object started off as an odd colored red light, it's shape became apparent as it drew closer and flew overhead.  i lost sight of it because of trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the morning ooking at the sky , the object was low in the skyline , i stared at it for approximately 23 minutes before it disapeared.
content.summary: Initally bright light flashing multi coloured object hovering and scanning  , then red flashing object met other object both dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on 287 between the exits for 202 and 76 at around 12:15-12:20 am. to the left there was a light catching my attention. my first impression was that it was one of those spot lights that establishments frequently put outside to draw attention from a distance, with lights pointing towards teh sky, but then i realized that this wasn't like that at all because the light was coming from the sky, and not pointed towards the ground, but pointed horizontally. it appeared like a light house would, with a two beams of light pointing in opposite directions and spinning from their source, staying 180 degrees apart. the lights were parallel to the ground. this looked like if there was a large light house within the cloud and the beams of light continued to spin at a fixed rate and from a fixed location for the entire time i watched it, which was as i traveled down the highway. the beams of light were illuminated in the sky by the light cloud coverage. the beams of light were very strong and very wide, much wider than search lights typically appear on helicopters, and rotating from their source at a fixed speed and fixed angle. they came from inside of the cloud, and judging by the sky, if its elevation was normal for that type of cloud, the light source must have been a very very large bulb, because the beam of light appeared to be about as wide as a quarter when it passed parallel above my sunroof. after i passed 76 the treeline prevented me from watching it further, but i'm sure it continued.
content.summary: Cloud emitting two beams of lights which moved in a 360 spin like a lighthouse

content.detailedDescription: On june 16, 2012 at around 10pm, my brother and i were driving south on hwy 6, crossing the grand river in caledonia when we observed two orange, firelike balls to the south west, over the area of the old mill.  the balls appeared to be the size of large hot air balloons, but were perfectly round and appeared to be illuminated, the colour of orange fire but not flickering.  one object was higher than the other, maybe seperated by 100 yards and at about a 60 degree angle from each other.  they were both in perfect syncronization and both travelled north.  another man and his wife pulled over as we did, for some reason, none of us got out of our vehicles.  we joked, in an awkward way about 'war of the worlds', but it was very awkward as we were both seriously seeing something we never had seen before.  we didn't know what to say to each other.  as the objects continued north, they appeared to ascend then became very small, the colour changed to greenish blue then disapeared suddenly.  two more objects came from the south, in the exact same manner as the previous two, and followed the exact same path and, like dejavue, they both disappeared in the same manner.  the initial speed would be compared to a small plane, but the ascent was uncomparable to any thing i've ever seen.  we seperated from the other two witnesses and immeditatly attended a family function and told everyone what we saw, you can imagine their reaction.  they had lots of suggestions as to what it may have been, but honestly, i don't think anyone could ever explain this to me.  this weekend is the hamilton airshow but there is no plane that looks like or can do what these things did.
content.summary: 2 orange firelike balls travelled n/b in sky, maybe 100 yards apart, one higher than the other, then ascended and disappeared, followed by two more doing the exact same thing.

content.detailedDescription: These objects streaked the sky so fast that they were undetectable to the human eye. i count 5 in the picture flying in some type of formation.
content.summary: Ufo buzzes farm tractor and cars

content.detailedDescription: I live in the annapolis valley and saw insane ufo activity last night approximately 3 am june 17/2012, i saw ufo's bright orange going straight up, straight down, 90 degree turns, always just 'disappearing' into nothing so obviously not a star and no flashing lights, no trails, no sound at all and besides planes don't shoot up straight from the horizon then stop mid air then shoot straight up again, stop...Hover.  and a chopper would have been heard. anyhoo, one particular orb ship/ufo seemed to fly up from the ground straight up got very very bright, stopped...And hovered directly below another 'star'. which then became two stars, then 3, one with a white light, original one, then a red light beside it, then a blue or green light it was difficult to tell. they pulsated from left to right white to blue/green and remained stationary in their position for approximately a half hour or more. i've seen ufo's before but never like last night, which lead me to say 'holy crap how many are actually stars at all and how many are just hanging out?'. i must have seen at least 14 ufos and i've never seen that many in one sighting ever. i was watching south by the way in the annapolis valley facing the south shore.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo's south facing june 17/2012

content.detailedDescription: Went out to get the mail last night around 9:00pm, noticed it was a nice clear night, paused on driveway to look at the stars, noticed big dipper directly overhead. my eye caught an object through the treeline across the street. we live about 6 miles sw of flying cloud airport so i figured it was a small plane. as it broke the treeline i noticed it was orange in color, couldn't really make out a shape but about the size of a small plane at 500ft or so but there were no red or green or flashing navigation lights, just an orange glow, it was traveling in a west to east direction. didn't hear any sound other than nightime crickets, it continued on a straight path about the speed a small plane would make just after takeoff. as it was further away it dimmed about 50% then returned to original brightness. it did this about three times then it dimmed out completely and i lost sight of it. no clouds in sky, very clear night. thought it was kind of a strange.
content.summary: Orange object moving silent across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Michele and i went out to watch the stars last night and caught a few ufos while we were out. i took a compass, cellphone for accurate time, a flashlight, a pen, and paper. 

10:18 - spotted an object the size/shape of a star traveling wsw to ene, solid, no brightness changes, slightly faster than a plane, about 60-deg on horizon to the south

11:16 - moving s=>n almost directly overhead as it passed the tail of the little dipper (not sure if it was little or big dipper), it increased brightness for about 2 seconds as it passed the 3nd and 2nd star in the ladle on the west side about 15% of the distance between these same 2 stars,and dimmed back down continued it's unchanged flight path. 

11:23 - another object, same flight path this time it flashed before reaching the 3rd and 2nd stars in the ladle. as it flashed over 2 seconds witness 2 noticed it gradually arced it's path slightly west. 

11:31 - a third object made a turn by the handle in the same spot but curved and turned more than any of the other objects. there was no flash from this object. 

all were silent, about the same size/average brightness of a star in the sky, we seemed to notice these objects around the same place almost 90deg overhead (we were laying on the dock looking up) and we followed them across the sky until they were too dim to see. we saw planes that night and one meteor that was much larger (3-4x in size) and much brighter (2-3x).
content.summary: 2 ufos flashed as they traveled the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was feeling scared and out of nowhere, pulled the covers over my head, pulled them back down there is an alien to my left and suddenly i feel frozen or i can't move, like i'm out of breath and then i'm seeing a 4 dimensional square in my vision. i'm watching the top right corner of the 4 dimensional squares and i can see an alien inside our house. anyway.. the next thing i know i'm screaming really loud and my parent bust in, no one is there. 

the next day my room is a disaster, all the clothes thrown and scattered very awkwardly across the floor in a way where you cant see the floor. my parents thought i did it and i was spanked for it, they don't know why it was like that. 

this was either a burglar or an encounter but the memory is very real, i am 100% positive that i wasn't dreaming when this happened to me. i urinated in bed for years after this memory
content.summary: Encounter of entity

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard, looking up at the stars as i do when i am out smoking. i noticed what i thought was a satellite moving from west to east at a fast speed and then changing direction left to right and then it would slow down and stop. it would get brighter and as it moved , would get dimmer. i had trouble following it until it got brighter again. it would seem to move in circles before continuing eastward. it would slow and speed up at will. there were no planes or any other objects in the area. i have seen many satellites and they move fast and in a straight line until fading out. i have seen bright flairs , so i know the difference. i have seen this object before when i was not looking for it. i was never looking for this sort of thing , but they are curious to see. i watched it for about four minutes until it disappeared in the east. it was, i think in low orbit and under intelligent control. i would like to know what others think this is. thank-you very much.
content.summary: Seen from my back yard. looked like a satellite moving west to east changing direction  and  getting brighter and dimmer. not a flair

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a plane comming in only all orange in color thats what drew my attention. looking into the north sky it was flying towards me in the south then changed direction going to the east  when it started to loose size until it was a pin prick then dissappear as another appeared from the same north to south and followed the same path and dimminish in size until gone as the 1st had done. wanted to stay out and watch but my grandson got pretty freaked out and wanted to go indoors. called my husband and grandson out when 1st light changed direction and while i was pointing to where 1st one was getting smaller in size my 9 yr. old grandson pointed to the second one and said like that one which is when i noticed the 2nd one that just seem to appear out of nowhere.
content.summary: bright orange light like a airplane comming in then direction change till it disappeared then the 2nd following same path and disappearing also

content.detailedDescription:
The first one i saw was in the sky for at least a couple hours, was talking to a friend on the phone, then out of no where started to move from its spot in the sky and head north. then just was gone i could no long see it.

just happened to look up and watched another moving across the sky heading north and then after a while i was unable to see it as well.

the first 3 i saw was like i described above. 
the fourth one i saw what at first i thought was a plane but then noticed that the blinking lights were not as planes and not in the same location as planes. "my father was a pilot and flew a lot so i have seen and been around planes day and night"
any who this object would fly for a while and then hover in one spot for a moment and then move again this object was heading west towards the mountains. i then saw it fly towards an amber looking light in the sky and stop and hover and then the amber light that i noticed since i was sitting out side tonight just got really bright and then flashed a couple of times did like a jolt like movement and then just back to normal state and then the other object just flew off and just vanished.

the main one that got my attention was when i was looking just straight ahead i noticed in the left corner of my left eye a bright bright white light. i looked to my left to see this rather good size bright light moving across the sky heading north. when i first saw it i would say it was just slightly bigger than a golf ball as it moved north i noticed that it was getting smaller in size and the light was getting dimmer as it went above me. the the light was gone and i saw a shadow type object and it was not round at all i can not explain the shape that i saw, however eventually i lost the ability to see it anymore.

this is "not" the first time i have seen strange "objects" in the night sky here. i have always all my life been a night sky watcher just looking at the stars etc. i started to noticed odd/strange "objects" since jan of 2012.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One i thought was a star found out not, the other started out bright very bright then dimmed to nothing

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my house at around midnight to smoke a cigarette out front of my house and saw an orange orb just to the west of the transmission tower at benson high school(which is 1 block north of my home) and it was just above(and west) of the highest light at the tower. i ran inside and grabbed my droid bionic work phone with 8mp camera. i shot 2 videos neither one turned out well because i'm not a photographer(saved both to camera). the orange orb appeared to the west and just above the tower but the distance behind it is unknown. it traveled to the east at a fairly moderate rate, just faster than you would expect an airplane to travel. from the time i saw this orb from the time it disappeared was 2 minutes or less it disappeared just before its path would have taken its line of sight behind a tall pine tree across the street. i thought it was odd for two reasons. #1 i live close enough to the airport in omaha where an airplane is obvious at a distance (white/ red flashing lights) this was distinctly orange(no flashing). #2 i saw a similar object in very close proximity weeks earlier in early evening appear to rise from the city travel north then east before fading out as if a fire was dying.
content.summary: Saw an orange light just west of radio tower at benson high travel west to east & vanish before it would've went behind a tree. second orange orb in a month to north of my home

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my house at around midnight to smoke a cigarette out front of my house and saw an orange orb just to the west of the transmission tower at benson high school(which is 1 block north of my home) and it was just above(and west) of the highest light at the tower. i ran inside and grabbed my droid bionic work phone with 8mp camera. i shot 2 videos neither one turned out well because i'm not a photographer(saved both to camera). the orange orb appeared to the west and just above the tower but the distance behind it is unknown. it traveled to the east at a fairly moderate rate, just faster than you would expect an airplane to travel. from the time i saw this orb from the time it disappeared was 2 minutes or less it disappeared just before its path would have taken its line of sight behind a tall pine tree across the street. i thought it was odd for two reasons. #1 i live close enough to the airport in omaha where an airplane is obvious at a distance (white/ red flashing lights) this was distinctly orange(no flashing). #2 i saw a similar object in very close proximity weeks earlier in early evening appear to rise from the city travel north then east before fading out as if a fire was dying.
content.summary: Saw an orange light just west of radio tower at benson high travel west to east & vanish before it would've went behind a tree. second orange orb in a month to north of my home

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my house at around midnight to smoke a cigarette out front of my house and saw an orange orb just to the west of the transmission tower at benson high school(which is 1 block north of my home) and it was just above(and west) of the highest light at the tower. i ran inside and grabbed my droid bionic work phone with 8mp camera. i shot 2 videos neither one turned out well because i'm not a photographer(saved both to camera). the orange orb appeared to the west and just above the tower but the distance behind it is unknown. it traveled to the east at a fairly moderate rate, just faster than you would expect an airplane to travel. from the time i saw this orb from the time it disappeared was 2 minutes or less it disappeared just before its path would have taken its line of sight behind a tall pine tree across the street. i thought it was odd for two reasons. #1 i live close enough to the airport in omaha where an airplane is obvious at a distance (white/ red flashing lights) this was distinctly orange(no flashing). #2 i saw a similar object in very close proximity weeks earlier in early evening appear to rise from the city travel north then east before fading out as if a fire was dying.
content.summary: Saw an orange light just west of radio tower at benson high travel west to east & vanish before it would've went behind a tree. second orange orb in a month to north of my home

content.detailedDescription: i was parked on a dirt road east of area 5 at approx 0225 hours. while parked with the engine off i heard a whooping sound to the rear of my vehicle . i looked out the drivers side window and saw a diamond shaped craft hovering. the craft had a redish blue light located in the middle of the craft on the bottom. at this time i retreaved my issued m-16 and i pointed it at the craft. the craft then turned to its right and at a rapid speed disapeared into the night sky.
content.summary: Diamond shape makinf a whooping sound like a helicopter but no wind

content.detailedDescription: On june 16, 2012, at 9:45 pm, over northeast pennsylvania,(while sitting in my backyard) i observed in the sky coming from the west, what i thought was a shooting star at first, but soon realized that what i saw could not be that. the object quickly changed directions, and in a zig zag pattern, i knew that it could not be a shooting star. i observed the object follow this pattern going to the east near the big dipper constellation. i watched it approx for 40 seconds, and thank goodness it was long enough for me to point it out, and my friend was able to observe the same object in the sky. there is also no way this could have been a satellite as they move slowly and in a straight line. no way was this a plane. it moved way to fast and a plane does not move in this manner.  i also know my eyes were not playing tricks on me as i have watched the skies for many years, and not once have i ever seen anything like this ever!!!!
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:30 pm i was outside with my dog and spotted what appeared to be a typical satellite. i watched the satellite move in an east-west direction at a steady pace for a few seconds. then it stopped. the sky was clear and i did not ever lose sight of the object. had i not been watching it as it moved through the sky, i would have assumed it was just a star. it's color and intensity were very much the same as most of the stars in that area of the sky. i carefully marked its position relative to the stars around it and watched it closely. after about 10 minutes, something moving around in the woods by my house caused my dog to start barking so we went back inside. i checked as i went inside, and it still had not moved. i have seen some odd things i can't explain before. i have always been curious, but this is the first time seeing something has bothered me. i was a little spooked afterward, and had an uneasy, jumpy feeling the rest of the night.
content.summary: Satellite moving east-west stopped.

content.detailedDescription: I went out saturday evening to cover my motorcycle for the night at 9:45 pm. i looked around and saw a flashing light in the sky.It was different becasue it was out of the normal flight pattern of the jets that fly over at around 15,000 to 20,000 feet. it was white with a flashing red and blue to green lighs. my son came out to check on me and that is when he saw the objects as well. i went to get the binoculars and could see a definte red light on the side and blue green on the other. this was not a plane because of the flashing pattern that it was producing. also it appered to be at a very high altitude. we watched for around 30 minutes before we went in side for the nght. while watching and without saying anything to my son, he noticed that the lights were moving around very quickly and asked if i saw it too or if his eyes were messing up ( i did).
content.summary: two starlike object with flashing red and blueish green lights that seemed to be communicating.

content.detailedDescription:
We were out for a drive returning home when we noticed a bizarre object in the sky. followed it for about 5 minutes in car before it disappeared suddenly. drove to the end of the road where there are fields that continue north and offer a wide view the sky. noticed other neighbours out of home also watching horizon.

object resembled a fireball racing across the sky. it was moving too rapidly to be a meteor and too erratically to be an aircraft. airport in area, but did not resemble any helicopters/planes. no power plants or government installations in region.

object was large enough to be seen from several miles away towards the north of lindsay. it was orange-red in colour. object was flying below the cloud cover, but significantly higher than trees.
content.summary: Fireball/object in sky with erratic flight path moving quickly and disappearing suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside, across the street from my house, walking my dog out to use the bathroom. while she was sniffing around doing her thing, i looked up above the church that is across the street and there was a very large, dimly lit, white object moving very fast from my right to my left. it was pretty low to the ground, not as high as an airplane might be. there were no blinking lights on it that would indicate a commercial aircraft and it made no sound as it moved through the sky. just before it went over a set of trees (where i would have lost sight of it) it grew very bright white, almost as bright as a full moon, and shot straight up into the air at breakneck speeds. i was in the air force for 6 years. i've never seen, in person, an aircraft capable of this maneuver. i have always believed in ufos but have never actually seen one, until tonight! purely the most amazing thing i've ever witnessed with my own eyes!
content.summary: Very fast, horizontally moving object...Dimly lit with white light. grew very bright white in color before shooting straight up into the air!

content.detailedDescription: Me and a couple of friends were outside looking at the stars at around midnight when this bright light appeared from the west and was cumming towards us,i stated to my friends that i thought it looked kind of strange and i didn't think that it was a plane or a star.,we all observed the object cumming closer,as it got to about 1-mile from us the object then banked to are left and as it went by the light that the object was emitting from the front only., i could see that the light was only cumming from the front cause as the object went past us the light just dimmed out and it was no longer visible to us.We all agreed that it was strange,the object made no noise at all,it was about 10,000-feet in elevation,and there were no faa required beacons observed.What the object was that we saw is unknown.
content.summary: Bright light comming sraight at us ,then banked left,light  slowly faded to black as object  flew above us.

content.detailedDescription: A white orb the size of a golf ball appeared to fall as a feather from a pasing hawk. it hoovered a second then slowly proceeded above the tree line
content.summary: A white orb the size of a golf ball appeared to fall as a feather from a pasing hawk. it hoovered a second then slowly proceeded above the tree line

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting on my rooftop at 3am on june 15th, 2012. while admiring the city lights, my friend noticed this white light in the sky that was shaped like a circle. the  light was ascending diagonally and we witnessed it vanish after about 10 seconds. we then immediately felt a strong energetic presence around and within us. for the next hour we continuously were experiencing full-body chills while trying to communicate and understand what was happening. the chills came in waves in regard to our emotional state and were ignited anytime we tried to communicate with them verbally. we were inside my apartment at this time and felt the entire room fill with this strong presence. once we acknowledged their presence by stating that we were here with respect and recognizing that this energy was in the room, a sense of lightness would come upon us, but did not leave completely. we both heard static and decided to communicate with this energy via psychic-tarot cards and well as medicine cards. as i began to draw the medicine cards, the 3 that came up were: fear, give-away, and medicine woman (we are two females). at that moment we experience a synchronized connection with this energy. i then proceeded to pull cards from my psychic tarot deck and went through the entire deck in a storyline. certain cards that were significant were: universe, authority, destiny, harmony, intuition, and awareness. after pulling all the cards, the computer in the room began to beep and the energy began to diminish i pulled a pulled a few more card from the medicine deck and the final card was a jaguar that represent integrity. the energy in the room became still and we experienced extreme exhaustion. 
the entire experience was about an hour, but felt like 3 hours.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright white light ascending in the sky and then vanished. shortly after experience energetic contact for about an hour.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving and it looked like a firework or a shooting star but we knew it wasn't. it went from right to left in the sky above the tree tops but not as far up as the clouds. it didn't go into a cloud but disappeared out of nowhere
content.summary: Like a shooting star but really low, super bright colors and moving from right to left like a shooting star, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, a friend of hers and myself were driving south on fairview st. in santa ana california on the night of june 15, 2012 at 11:15 pm when my wife noticed some odd lights  coming towards us in the sky.  we pulled off the road at seventeenth st. to look at them.  they were moving slowly over fairview st.  in the opposite direction of our travel.  at first there were two then three, then as they approached there were eight in total.  they made no sound.  they were not in an evenly spaced pattern and were possibly two thousand feet high.  each had what appeared to be bright lights.  they did not have the form of helicopters or airplanes.  they moved slowly above us and one by one they disappeared above a thin cloud cover.  two other people had also pulled off the road to observe them.  i tried to call the local news agency's but got no response.
       at first i thought they were helicopters but there was no noise and the lights were different.  i was reminded of the lights seen in arizona but they were not evenly spaced.  it could have been an air force training mission but this was not logical over santa ana on friday night.  they were lower than private aircraft are alowed to fly and having seen many of the tv shows about ufo sightings i was inclined to wonder if we were actually seeing ufo's.  it was very strange.  they flew over us, gained altitude over the thin cloud cover and disappeared.
content.summary: Strange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I came out of a bar for some fresh air and looked up in the sky (east of 43rd ave/ dunlap-olive���  sunday evening ��� was not drinking!! )  in the distance far far away, a bright white cross appeared from no where, over the mountains. from the crossing points of the cross, a projectile shot out and headed in my direction, west by southwest.  

note: once the projectile left the bright white cross, the cross itself minimized it self and disappeared. 

the ball shaped object soared above me no higher then like at an air show. it looked moon shaped with dark and light craters. would say it was approx. a 20 foot diameter. flames were shooting out the entire backside. it was silent, no noise. lost site of it going over the buildings on dunlap. i  ran  to the north side of the building and looked westward but could not see where the object had gone.
content.summary: Apperance if white cross/ 20 foot projectile shot out of it/ then white cross shrunk and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was at work cleaning the store parking lot when i noticed a red pulsating ball of light above the buildings in front of me. it was not directly above them, they just happened to be blocking the view for the most part. after a few moments, it was in full view and heading at a relatively low speed to the north west. i thought it may be a helicopter rotor light, there where no other lights on the object/sphere however. the light did seem to be a fairly dark red but was lighter near the edges, with a gentle blending of said shades via the pulsating. the outermost edges where rather blurry but it was 1am in the morning and there where florescent lights behind me, this may have played a trick on my eyesight. i am sure that there where no strobe lights. perhaps it was a flare of some sort, i do not know.
content.summary: Ball of light heading towards north west buffalo.

content.detailedDescription: Just after 730pm on 16th june 2012, i walked out my back yard as my dog was howling and i go to the 1st step and noticed an air plane flying from the south east heading toward the north west toward the airport.  it travelled toward the horizon then there was a huge flash of light that filled the entire sky that was really strange. it was an unusual blue greeny color - almost started like a radiation outward of energy like an expanding light that went in all directions...  i was shocked/awed by what i saw and my heart was racing... its like something from twilight zone or the movies... it was quick but bloody enormous! whatever it was it cause the power in my house to go out and come back on... i have one witness to the affects it had on the power...(she was inside) i couldnt help but think immediately the idea of an em pulse but it wasn't an explosion as there was no sound at all and no wind.  it definately was not lightning - it expanded outwards... the plane was still visible in the distance... no idea what is was other than unidentified
content.summary: Massive blue green pulse of light in the sky disrupted power
